titleStmt.title: Three sermons The former discouering a double and false heart, vpon the I. King. 21. 9. and 10. The second called, the blessednes of the righteous, vpon Psalm. 37. verse 37. The third, the court of guard, or watch of angels: I, Sam. 17. 37. By Nathaniel Cannon, Preacher of Gods Word at Hurley in Berkeshire.
titleStmt.author: Cannon, Nathanael, 1581 or 2-1664.

titleStmt.title: Three sermons The former discouering a double and false heart, vpon the I. King. 21. 9. and 10. The second called, the blessednes of the righteous, vpon Psalm. 37. verse 37. publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. C[reede] and B. A[lsop] for William Welby, and are to be sold in Pauls Church yard, at the signe of the Swan,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A double heart.
Imperfect as filmed? Includes first sermon only.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
